title: Calligraphy in Running Script
marks: Signature and Marks L center, in Japanese
description: eleven full lines of calligraphy; one character at top of twelfth line; two broken lines (including signature) at far left; light tan outline around text; red seal at URC; two red relief seals at LLC
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
